title: OpenTTD Version 1.3.2
description:
This is the current version of OpenTTD (as of 15SEP13), all packaged up and ready to run on Mac. The required files are the recommended open source files. I only packaged this so people can easily download and play right away, instead of manually installing the game. Please seed, as this game is lesser known. Thanks! 



************ GAME DETAILS: ************
OFFICIAL SHORT:
OpenTTD is an open source simulation game based upon the popular Microprose game "Transport Tycoon Deluxe", written by Chris Sawyer. It attempts to mimic the original game as closely as possible while extending it with new features.


MINE:
Fun small game that allows you to build a transportation empire using trucks, trains, planes, and/or ships. It can be a bit easy, but I find it enjoyable. It is pretty easy to learn. It has MANY options and settings so you can change it to make it easier or harder, if you would like. You can make your own maps too. Its a good version of the classic game. 



Some quick specs:
Multiplayer up to 255 players
HUGE maps
Customizable settings to make any map you want
Terraforming and canal construction
Classic game with "lite" graphics allows use on just about any Mac out there
25 MB zipped, 45 MB extracted



Support for the game and more details is available at http://www.openttd.org/en/

Comment with any questions orÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ well, comments. Enjoy!
